scripts.prepdir: mkdir -p botguard/includes/vendor/wolfsoft/botguard-php && cp -a src/* botguard/ && cp LICENSE.txt botguard/
scripts.copyvendor: cp -a vendor/composer botguard/includes/vendor/ && cp -a vendor/autoload.php botguard/includes/vendor/ && cp -a vendor/wolfsoft/botguard-php/src botguard/includes/vendor/wolfsoft/botguard-php/
scripts.addstubs: echo '<?php // Silence is golden' > /tmp/index.php && find botguard/ -type d -exec cp /tmp/index.php '{}' ';' && rm -f /tmp/index.php
scripts.fixacl: find botguard/ -type d -exec chmod ug=rwx,o=rx '{}' ';' && find botguard/ -type f -exec chmod ug=rw,o=r '{}' ';'
